Title: Code Generation Guidance Package
Description: A Guidance package which allows you to generate items from within Visual Studio, selecting metadata from a wizard and generating against a T4 template.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Guidance package which allows you to generate items from within Visual Studio, selecting metadata from a wizard and generating against a T4 template.

See the following blog posts for more details:
  • Code Generation Guidance Package - describes the base Code Generation GAX package
  • Sixeyed.Guidance.CodeGeneration Sample Package - describes customizing the basic package with tailored recipes
  • Sixeyed.Guidance.CodeGeneration: Technical Walkthrough - technical description of the Code Generation components
